item.title: [HELP!] Fix run.bat from loading JDK7
item.dc:creator: @forever-rune forever-rune
item.description:
@forever-rune wrote:

Help please?
My client is loading jre7 and i want to change it because alot of players dont have JDK7 and just don’t even try to download it.
Quote

@echo off
Title LeanPkz V1
cd ./
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

I’ve tried changing jre7 to jre6
I’ve tried changing program files to program files (x86)
Please helpppppp

Read full topic
